apollo-11.name: Apollo 11
apollo-11.summary: First crewed lunar landing placing humans on the Moon and returning them safely to Earth.

apollo-17.name: Apollo 17
apollo-17.summary: Final Apollo mission, delivering extensive geological sampling of the Taurus-Littrow valley.

lro.name: Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter
lro.summary: High-resolution lunar mapping mission supporting landing site selection and polar ice prospecting.

iss.name: International Space Station
iss.summary: Microgravity research platform and proving ground for long-duration human spaceflight.

landsat.name: Landsat Program
landsat.summary: Continuous multispectral imaging archive monitoring Earth's surface change.

perseverance.name: Mars Perseverance Rover
perseverance.summary: Rover investigating astrobiology and caching samples in Jezero crater.

maven.name: MAVEN
maven.summary: Orbiter characterising Mars' upper atmosphere and its escape to space.

insight.name: InSight
insight.summary: Geophysical lander measuring Marsquakes to probe the planet's interior.
